ex2

Class SpaceWars

  • java.lang.Object
    • ex2.SpaceWars

  • public class SpaceWars
extends java.lang.Object
    This class acts as the driver for the Space Wars game. It is part of Ex57 (see the exercise description for more details).
    Author:
    oop

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      The runner spaceship type
      static int SPECIAL_SHIP
      The special ship you designed yourself

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpaceWars

        public SpaceWars(java.lang.String[] args)
        Creates a new game.
        Parameters:
        args - the command line arguments that indicate which types of spaceships to add to the game.

    • Method Detail

      • getGUI

        public oop.ex2.GameGUI getGUI()
        Gets the GUI object we are drawing with. This method can be used by the spaceships to obtain the GUI for their own use.
        Returns:
        the gui object.

      • addShot

        public void addShot(oop.ex2.SpaceShipPhysics position)
        Fires a new shot from the current location of the spaceship. The shot will automatically be managed by the SpaceWars game object.
        Parameters:
        position - the position of the firing spaceship.

      • getClosestShipTo

        public SpaceShip getClosestShipTo(SpaceShip ship)
        returns the ship that is closest to the given one.
        Parameters:
        ship - the given ship
        Returns:
        the closest ship to the given one.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Runs the game.
        Parameters:
        args - command line arguments. These should describe the type of the spaceships in the game. See the exercise description for details.
